column1: Kata Robata////Soy Ramen: I got hyped about this because the diners next to us were talking it up in their conversation (sorry
column2: not sorry for eavesdropping). It had a really classic and beautiful presentation. I dipped my spoon in to taste the broth. Whoa. This is disgusting. Like
column3: we couldn't tell if they added mayo or an absurd amount of butter to the broth but the only flavor we could get taste in the broth was this butter/mayo taste. Jinya is LEAPS AND BOUNDS over this ramen
column4: and I don't even have a deep love for Jinya.
